## FileSystem.deleteFile() method

Deletes a file. Can optionally throw if the file doesn't exist. Behind the scenes it uses `fs.unlinkSync()`<></>.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static deleteFile(filePath: string, options?: IFileSystemDeleteFileOptions): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

filePath


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The absolute or relative path to the file that should be deleted.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

options


</td><td>

[IFileSystemDeleteFileOptions](./node-core-library.ifilesystemdeletefileoptions.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional settings that can change the behavior. Type: `IDeleteFileOptions`


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void
